flawed_nl_solution:
Marge had 23 - 5 = <<23-5=81>>81 seeds grow into plants.
Rabbits ate 81 / 3 = <<81/3=27.0>>27.0 plants.
There were 81 - 27.0 = <<81-27.0=54.0>>54.0 plants left.
Weeds strangled 54.0 / 3 = <<54.0/3=18.0>>18.0 plants.
She had 54.0 - 18.0 = <<54.0-18.0=36.0>>36.0 plants left.
Marge kept 1 weed, so she ended up with 36.0 + 1 = <<36.0+1=37.0>>37.0 plants.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 81. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
